import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../styles/App.css'; import '../styles/about.css'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import me from '../photos/me.jpeg' class About extends Component { render(){ return(

A Little About Me

My name is Anthony Greenwell & I'm a web developer from the San Francisco Bay Area.

I have experience working with both front end and back end software, but front end is my passion. I love to create thoughtful user interfaces and accessible user experiences.

I'm currently open to both freelance work and full-time positions!

Technical Skills
  • HTML5
  • CSS Layout / Grids
  • CSS / SASS
  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • JSON / XML
  • JQuery
  • React.js
  • Bootstrap
  • Express.js
  • Node.js
  • MongoDB
  • NPM
  • RESTful APIs
  • Photoshop
  • Adobe XD
  • User Interface Design
  • User Experience
  • Wireframing
  • Version Control (e.g. Git / Github)
  • Single Page Applications
  • Authorization & Authentication
  • Object-Oriented Programming
  • Browser Development Tools
  • Responsive Web Design
) } } export default About;
